welcome_message_body: Welcome to North Providence, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful parks! We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that this lovely city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Central Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T.F. Green Airport handles all commercial flights and is divided into two concourses: Concourse A and Concourse B.

terminals.name: Interlink Terminal
terminals.description: The Interlink Terminal at T.F. Green Airport is a modern transportation hub that connects the airport to the MBTA commuter rail and other ground transportation services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Memorial Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport serves all commercial flights and provides various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at New Bedford Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services for VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
